body: I have to add in that I didn't read the next page, but now I did. How the hell do they even look anything alike? That just seems...racist. Because the only similarity I see is them being Asian. Aside from that, the similarities end right there.
And here I was hoping a foursome was coming along... still good though.
Sigh they had us there in the start not gonna lie
The characters are incredibly OoC. The only good thing about this story was seeing Lance fucking Allura. A disaster.
"He's my brother" yeah... you should still fuck the shit out of shiro
Too much klance :C I need one with our space daddy Shiro.

They were doing so well and then they RUIN this whole thing by pulling a 'brogane' card. HOW MANY TIMES DO THE WRITERS OF THE SHOW HAVE TO SAY THEY AREN'T RELATED FOR IT TO SINK? I mean, I would've been fine if Lance walked in on Shiro and Keith and Keith asks Lance to join in? But really, "He's my brother" Since when, Keith?
